column2: This character has read a sutra, which has created a sense of ease and rejuvenation in thier kingship.
This character has read a sutra, which has created a clearer sense of understanding of dharma and thier kingship.
This character has read a sutra, which has espouses their kingship and thier role as earthly judges of Karma and Dharma.
This character has read a sutra for which life is of particular importance and thus they cultivate a garden in accordance to Dharma.
